name: log_sales_activity
description: Logs a sales activity reported by a user, validating against the known product catalog and capturing all required details.

response.description: A friendly, professional response confirming the sale or asking for missing details.

log_type.description: Indicates this is a sales logging action.

description.description: Concise summary of the sale, including product name, quantity, and location.

sale_date.description: Date of sale in YYYY/MM/DD format if given, else ask.

product_sold.description: Name of the product sold. Must match the product catalog.

quantity.description: Number of units or bags sold.

location.description: Location or branch of the farm.

next_action.description: Whether more information is needed or the log is complete.

intent.description: If next_action is ask_next, put '7', else null.
